code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[message,setMessage]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{console.log('Trying to fetch: http://192.168.1.154:5000/api');fetch('http://192.168.1.154:5000/api').then(res=>{if(!res.ok)throw new Error("HTTP error: ".concat(res.status));return res.json();}).then(data=>setMessage(data.message)).catch(err=>{console.error('Fetch failed:',err);setMessage('Backend not reachable');});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{textAlign:'center',padding:'2rem'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"React Frontend"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["API Response: ",message]})]});}export default App;
